mapper.select: SELECT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmZipcode , a.ifmmAddr1 , a.ifmmAddr2 , a.ifmmAddr3 , a.ifmmID , a.ifmmPW , a.ifmmNickname , a.ifmmTelecom , a.ifmmTel , a.ifmmEmail , a.ifmmEmailID , a.ifmmEmailDomain , a.ifmmIntroduction , a.ifmmRegDate , a.ifmmModDate , a.ifmmDelNy FROM member a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.ifmmSeq DESC;
SELECT a.* FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
SELECT ifmmSeq , ifmmID FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmID = #{ifmmID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE ifmmID = #{ifmmID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE ifmmNickname = #{ifmmNickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE ifmmNickname = #{ifmmNickname}
